column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The Good- everything I tasted was delicious
column4: and the pepperoni pizza. The fried items were hot
column6: and the marinara that came with was very good. My favorite though was the pizza. The crust was buttery and crispy-somewhere between a biscuit and pizza crust
column7: the cheese was plentiful and had that nice stretchy factor
column9: a little spicy and the sauce was great-not too heavy
column10: lightly seasoned and just the right amount. My dining partners really enjoyed everything. The location was perfect for us-not too far from parking.
